name: Hungry Fry
description:
Welcome to the dungeon. Attack all of the enemies and cannibalize them to satiate your never ending hunger. However, some of the bodies will harm, or benefit you. Last as long as you can!

Controls:

[Left Click] Attack

[E] Consume dead bodies (Get close)

[WASD] Up, Left, Down, Right respectively

Credits for Hungry Fry:

Art & Programming: borboss

Fonts:

  • dtinth: Comic Mono (Link)

Sounds:

  • Raclure: Damage (Link)
  • artisticdude: Attack (Link)
  • TheDragonsSpark: Eat (Link)

Known Issues:

  • Jitter when moving diagonally
  • Somewhat transparent sprites
  • Title Screen is funky...
